message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. Would you consider selling it to me for $80?
I understand that you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $85.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $80 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $82.50. I think it's a fair price considering the quality of the product. What do you think?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to pay $82 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $81.50. That's the lowest I can go.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your effort to reach a fair price. I would like to counter with an offer of $81 for the product.
I'm really close to accepting your offer, Bob. I'll meet you at $80.50. That's the best I can do.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering your last offer, I would like to propose a final offer of $80 for the product.
